channel.title: Tor Browser 8.* won't launch
channel.description:
My tbb updated today to version `8.0` and refused to launch with an `Error: 127`. Same error code I got when I had [this](http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/solved-whonix14-qubes3-2-latest-upgrade-prevent-tor-browser-from-launching/5345/14) problem with too many entries in `$XDG_CONFIG_DIRS`, even though that is not my current problem (I only have six entries there).
I have tried with all available tbb versions, and this happens on all versions `8.0` and higher.
Here is some output:
[bash -x torbrowser](https://paste.debian.net/plainh/a71f2e2d)
Something interesting here:
[bash -x start-tor-browser --debug](https://paste.debian.net/plainh/b738e8a4)

item.title: Tor Browser 8.* won't launch
item.dc:creator: ef86
item.description:
Runs perfectly on mine without any change!

ef86

Read full topic

item.title: Tor Browser 8.* won't launch
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Thanks!

github.com/Whonix/apparmor-profile-torbrowser

fix for Tor Browser 8 

/usr/bin/dirname rix,
https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-browser-8-wont-launch/5863
Thanks to @qubenix for suggesting to fix!
by adrelanos on 07:23AM - 06 Sep 18 UTC
changed 1 files with 1 additions and 0 deletions.

Read full topic

item.title: Tor Browser 8.* won't launch
item.dc:creator: qubenix
item.description:
Ok, I just realized this is an AppArmor issue and moved the thread accordingly. The profile now needs a line for: /usr/bin/dirname rix,. Then it works with 8.0.

Read full topic
